short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visit a company's website or LinkedIn page to discover similar companies using text analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-Find companies with similar characteristics to your customers
-Generate lookalike companies to expand on your current prospects
-Identify competitors and conduct research in your market
